definitions.definition: A loud , emphatic , exclamation of extreme emotion , especially horror , fear , excitement , or anger ; it may comprise a word or a sustained, high - pitched vowel sound .
A loud vocalisation of many animals , especially in response to pain or fear .
A form of singing associated with the metal and screamo styles of music. It is a loud, rough, distorted version of the voice; rather than the normal voice of the singer.

examples: We had a real scream of a time at the beach.

main_definition: A loud , emphatic , exclamation of extreme emotion , especially horror , fear , excitement , or anger ; it may comprise a word or a sustained, high - pitched vowel sound .
secondary_definitions: A loud vocalisation of many animals , especially in response to pain or fear .
( music ) A form of singing associated with the metal and screamo styles of music. It is a loud, rough, distorted version of the voice; rather than the normal voice of the singer.
